admission_text:
## membership - Join the crowd!

Annual membership has perks! If you aren’t already a member, join today to receive exclusive benefits such as free admission to HAHS sites, reciprocal membership benefits to other museums, subscription to our quarterly newsletter _Adobe Trails_ , and more!

Membership funds help the Historical Society fulfill its mission, and makes educational programs, interpretive exhibitions, and preservation of historic sites and artifacts possible.

Join Now 

### Membership Levels and Benefits

Member Benefits at the **Individual ($50)** level include: 

  * Personalized membership card for one member

  * Complimentary admission to the [Museum](/hahs-museum-of-history-culture) and [McConaghy House](/mcconaghy-house)

  * Members only mailings, including a complimentary subscription to [_Adobe Trails_](/adobe-trails), our quarterly newsletter

  * 10% discount in the museum store

  * Discounted tickets for events and special programs

  * Reciprocal membership to over 300 history museums, sites, and societies through [Time Travelers](http://timetravelers.mohistory.org/) – visit [timetravelers.mohistory.org](http://timetravelers.mohistory.org/) for more information

**Family Members ($80)** receive all Individual level benefits for two adults and children under 18 in the same household.

****Contributing Members ($100)** receive all of the above, additional reciprocal membership benefits to over 1000 museums of all disciplines through the [North American...
